dict.acceptation: 广告；做广告，登广告；广告业；

sent.orig: Static concept of the AdverA tise was given to the modern sense, into a "Advertising. "
sent.trans: 静止的物的概念的名词AdverAtise,被赋于现代意义，转化成为“Advertising”。

sent.orig: Advertising the broad and narrow the broad advertising including economic and non-economic advertising advertising.
sent.trans: 广告有广义和狭义之分，广义广告包括非经济广告和经济广告。

sent.orig: WAP; 3G; interactive advertising; messages advertising; mobile advertising; The Fifth Media; mobile Internet.
sent.trans: WAP;3G;互动广告；短信广告；手机广告；第五媒体；手机上网。

sent.orig: Comparative Advertising is an advertising form full of arguments which comprises both advantages and disadvantages.
sent.trans: 比较广告是一种争议颇大的广告形式，利弊共存。

sent.orig: GOOGLE Advertising optimized sequence, greatly increasing the advertising effect.
sent.trans: 优化了GOOGLE广告位排列顺序，大大增加了广告效果。
